message:
Hey everybody, what a great place for discussion Convore is!
We are about to launch the Beta version of Znak it! http://www.znakit.com  - Premium Content Monetization Platform. Znak it! is a very universal solution – it supports simply all formats and sizes of content (from text files to applications), it does not requires any application downloads or costly system integration and gives Content Providers 100% freedom in deciding which part of the webpage will be behind the payment gate.
We can process the charges as low as5 cents. Thanks to Znaks - the virtual currency pre-paid by users - the platform is safe and reliable. 

Please, share your opinions and suggestions, and inspiring feedback would be great.
So my users (or are they your users?) can choose between ad supported or paid ad free versions?

Ade Lack, Znak it! works right from your site, as an embeddable link or widget, there are several widgets and formats to choose from - and these are your users. The content can be also submitted for publication on our webpage (and we plan to make it social utility) and thus you can get more users. All content is paid with Znaks - our virtual currency. Users can buy Znaks with PayPal/Credit Cards or they can earn them watching ads etc. on Znakit! webpage. In both situations you set up your own access price (for each piece of content) and earn up to 96% of generated revenue.  If you are willing to use Znakit! from your site you do not have to resign from any form of monetization you already use.   Hope that helps and answers your questions.
